name: Loan & Mortgage Calculator Pro
author: Tekki Web Solutions

sections.description:
How Much Will My Monthly Or Daily Mortgage Payments Be? This plugin allows you to calculate your daily loan payments, using New LOC Information, Current Loan Information, Income and Expense and other General Information. It calculates Payoff Date and your Money Saved.

Use shortcode [pro-calc] to display calculator anywhere.
sections.installation:
Upload the Loan & Mortgage Calculator Pro plugin to your blog, Activate it.

1, 2, 3: You’re done!
sections.faq:
Can I email the calculated results to myself?

This will be available in the next update.

Can I download the calculated results?

This will be available in the next update.
